articles.description: Jefferies which has a 'buy' rating on the food delivery platform says that with only ~20mn monthly transacting users currently, Zomato has a long runway for customer acquisition and revenue growth.
articles.content: Shares of Zomato saw a 1.7 percent increase in trading on the NSE on September 18. More importantly, this gain was attributed to investors' growing confidence in the company, driven by Zomato demonst… [+1882 chars]

articles.title: L&T's Rs 10,000 crore share buyback opens today — From eligibility to acceptance, here are the details - CNBCTV18
articles.description: According to the buyback offer document, all eligible shareholders holding not more than 67 equity shares as of the record date, will be classified as small shareholders for the buyback purpose.
